= How to Release Retlang =

  # Make sure assembly version is set correctly
  # Build the project in Release Mode
  # Create Docs using [http://www.codeplex.com/Sandcastle Sandcastle]
  # Copy docs into output directory
  # Zip output dir and rename file to be consistent with other released zips
  # Upload Zip to google code
  # Rename chm doc file to proper version name
  # Upload docs separately
